overview: Dr. Balagurunathan’s research is focused on understanding the physiology of the tumor and its relationship to the underlying genome. His interests include data integration from various modalities (radiology, pathology, genome) to improve clinical decision support. His disease focus are prostate cancer, lung cancer and B-cell lymphomas.
